EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Video email-T001ZR.Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Stand out from the crowd and get the attention you deserve!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Calling all partners.
Did you know that the Nokia Global Partner Program provides you with marketing campaign packages that will enable you to launch your own co-branded campaigns in no time? Our tailored campaign kits include suggested e-mail content to assist with the buyer’s journey, landing page designs, static banner images, and social media messaging for you to build and run your own co-branded campaign. Contact Nokia <[[mailto:nokia_global_partner_communications@nokia.com?subject=I%20have%20a%20question%20about%20Nokia%20Support%20video%20for%20partners]]> to learn more about how Nokia can help extend your reach into new markets, and increase business with new customers.
The Nokia Global Partner Program … where standing out from the crowd never felt so good!
Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
